title: uragEndhra bhushaNam
sahitya:
uragEndra bhUSaNam tripura vibhISaNam param ArAdhayE mahAdEvam dainya shOSaNam

anupallavi

 paramEsham parAtparam varadam nIla kandharam paripUta gangAdharam dhrta mrgapurEshvaram

caraNam

 satyam shivam sundaram sakalEshvaram shankaram saccidAnandAkaram sarvArthakaram haram 
nityam niranjanam nigamAnta shObhanam nirmala vana tulasI vilvadaLa maNDanam
